notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Z.W., O.K. and K.B. designed the experiments, analyzed the data and wrote the paper; J.L.P. performed the HPLC analysis; R.C. and L.M. performed the GC-MS analysis; M.G. and A.S. carried out the anti-microbial analysis; E.P.-J. performed the antioxidant analysis; W.C. prepared the references.
